mapper.update: update SQL_CSV set DATABASE_NAME = #{databaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUERY = #{query,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUERY_ALT_1 = #{queryAlt1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUERY_ALT_2 = #{queryAlt2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM_MAP = #{paramMap,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETED_FLG = #{deletedFlg,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, DATABASE_NAME, QUERY, QUERY_ALT_1, QUERY_ALT_2, PARAM_MAP, UPDATED_AT, CREATED_AT, DELETED_FLG from SQL_CSV where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
